title: New ranked team bronze/silver
body:
Hey guys I'm looking to make a new ranked team with players who are keen and want to climb. I live in NZ and plan to do this Friday at 5:30pm every week.
I main jg>mid>support>ADC
Add me on league if interested and comment.
Thanks that's all XD{{champion:17}}

replies.body: Hey man I will be keen to join. I main top lane
Hey bro i'm keen on joining, I play mid top and jg (and support if I have to) i'm not the best and i'm only B2 but i'm keen on getting better for this team add me if interested.
I main support so feel free to add me
is this 5:30 nz time or aus time? if NZ time i can almost definitley join i might be able to if its aus time. i main mid/jg add me if interested
nz time i will add u

Hey dude,
I'd be interested in joining your team

Hey, I'm looking for a casual ranked team. With work I'm free for a game or two in the evenings. I am free Friday's at your 5:30 for a couple hours. I main supp. Currently B1, but I've played in tournaments supporting Dia. Add me if you want.

Dia=Supp
Silv=Adc, Bronze=Mid>Top>Jung
